As a Digital Forensics Analysts with Ph.D., your work involves conduct investigations on computer-based crimes establishing documentary or physical evidence, such as digital media and logs associated with cyber intrusion incidents. analyze digital evidence and investigate computer security incidents to derive information in support of system and network vulnerability mitigation. preserve and present computer-related evidence in support of criminal, fraud, counterintelligence, or law enforcement investigations.

occupation.title: Digital Forensics Analysts
occupation.description: Conduct investigations on computer-based crimes establishing documentary or physical evidence, such as digital media and logs associated with cyber intrusion incidents. Analyze digital evidence and investigate computer security incidents to derive information in support of system and network vulnerability mitigation. Preserve and present computer-related evidence in support of criminal, fraud, counterintelligence, or law enforcement investigations.
